w:r.w:t: will be introduced to animal names in this lesson. Knowing the names of various animals is essential in building
Learning about pets also facilitates conversations and connections with the students.

They will learn how to pronounce and spell the animal names. They will learn the difference between a dog and a puppy and a cat and a kitten. They will also respond to the teacher in complete sentences.
pletion of this lesson, the student
Recognize, spell, and pronounce the words for common animals
Use both sets of words in complete sentences

Spell and say bird: B-I-R-D – Bird. Underline each letter on the screen.

Spell and say fish: F-I-S-H- Fish. Underline each letter on the screen.
Clap each letter F-I-S-H –Fish Repeat two or three times
